Man escapes uninjured after arson attack on west Belfast home
01 Nov 2019, 12:29 by CLAIRE SIMPSON


Police are probing an arson attack at a house in west Belfast

A man has escaped uninjured following an arson attack on his west Belfast home early today.
A wheelie bin was set alight at the front door of the man's house at Aitnamona Crescent off the Glen Road at around 7.20am.
The fire damaged the front door and caused smoke damage inside the house.
Firefighters put out the blaze.
Police appealed to anyone with information to contact them on 101.
